title: stuck on "login status"...
body:
matches started lagging since yesterday all of a sudden. today i logged in and started a ranked game.
it lagged AND delayed from the first 1 minute, so i tried to relog back in but was stuck on "login status".
restarted the client more than 10 times, nothing changed. restarted my pc, nothing changed. tried looking it 
up in google, all articles were either from 2014 or 15-16.

am i the only one experiencing this problem? PLEASE HELP! i'd appreciate any feedback, thanks in advance!
guess i lost my promo...

replies.body: I don't see any issues with our servers right now, so I'm thinking that your network might be having problems reaching the authentication servers.  Yeah, really old posts probably won't have up to date info.  In this case, your best bet would be to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  I also suggest downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure firewall settings, in addition to checking any anti-virus settings.  Let me know if you have any questions!

in champselect right now, logged in, no problemo. let's see how in-game is. thanks for the quick feedback!
riot's support is on point, league community, not so much. :3
